name: Reddeer
body:
# RedDeer Eclipse testing framework

Red Deer project is extensible framework supporting building automated Eclipse tests. Red Deer provides high level API for comfortable testing of standard Eclipse components and also allows creating and extending own product API to be used in your specific tests. 

To get started, [install RedDeer to your Eclipse](https://github.com/jboss-reddeer/reddeer/wiki/Installation). Once you have RedDeer installed you can proceed by [writing your first minimal test](https://github.com/jboss-reddeer/reddeer/wiki/Write-and-run-your-first-minimal-functional-test) and [writing your own API](https://github.com/jboss-reddeer/reddeer/wiki/Write-you-own-RedDeer-API-for-your-tests). For more information see [User Guide](https://github.com/jboss-reddeer/reddeer/wiki/User-Guide). Latest stable RedDeer is available at 

> http://download.jboss.org/jbosstools/updates/stable/mars/core/reddeer/1.0.1/
